title: 1131.515518: About the achievement of this semester
description:
1131.515518 -> Forums -> ä¸€èˆ¬å…¬å‘Š -> About the achievement of this
semester
https://e3p.nycu.edu.tw/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=46269#p59746
About the achievement of this semester
by é™³å½¥ç‘‹ è³‡ç§‘å·¥åš / IOC - Tuesday, 10 December 2024, 8:36 PM
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

All achievements of Intro. to Network Programming, including Quiz 5 and
Assignment 6, have been posted at the link below.
That is to say, allÂ achievements are announced, excluding the final
project.

For Assignment 6, except for those who did not submit (scored 0), there are
also some students whose programs have issues that make it deducted.Â 
The reasons for these students' programs are listed in the grade sheet
also; we will not explain them individually.
The deducting criteria are the same as those mentioned in the announcement.
Moreover, the teaching assistant has not modified the program for those
marked with "CE" (compilation error), meaning the program downloaded from
E3 could not be successfully compiled. If you used any special compile
command, please let the TAs know via email.

If you have any questions regarding any achievement, please email us or
feel free to visit the lab (Room 703B, Electronic Information Building)
during the TA hours.

I wish you all the best at your final. Good Luck ^ ^

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11pF7trUHjnilS68hKwbJHelQ6wn8HI0WiG1CzyybJm0/edit?usp=sharing

Best,
TAs

[NOTICE] Written Final Exam
by å³å‡±å¼· è³‡å·¥ç³» / DCP - Tuesday, 10 December 2024, 12:20 AM
---------------------------------------------------------------------
The written final exam will be held on 3:30pm ~ 4:20pm, December 12
(Thursday).

Classroom assignment will be announced later.

Scope: Lecture 9 ~ Lecture 14

You can prepare ONE cheat sheet of A4 size (double-sided). You can make
"copy, cut and paste" fromÂ lecture notes [1], textbook, and online
material.
